company_website.summary: Black Lion Labs LLC is a cannabis company that specializes in cultivation, manufacturing, and white label services. They offer a wide range of THC and CBD products including flowers, edibles, vapes, and concentrates. The company also produces a line of award-winning sports nutrition supplements under the Black Lion Research brand.
company_website.infomration_about_the_team: Black Lion Labs LLC is a 24,000+ sq ft, state-of-the-art cannabis facility located in Costa Mesa, California. The company has between 11-50 employees and is led by a team of experienced executives in the cannabis and sports nutrition industries.
